title: Punishment meets care for Japan's elderly convicts
text:
Punishment meets care for Japan's elderly convicts 3:02pm IST - 01:38 
Reuters gets a rare look into one of Japan's ageing prison's - where convicts serving life sentences are losing their mobility, and their confidence to re-enter the outside world. Rosanna Philpott reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Reuters gets a rare look into one of Japan's ageing prison's - where convicts serving life sentences are losing their mobility, and their confidence to re-enter the outside world. Rosanna Philpott reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2pbpmO4
